lines.gurmukhi: diRgn kau ijhbw sÍn jau imlih jYsy dyKY qYsy kih suin gun gwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Drigan Kau Jihabaa Sravan Jau Milahi , Jaisay Daykhai Taisay Kahi Souni Goun Gaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If eyes get tongue and ears, then whatever it sees and hears with ears, it will then describe the reality and convey it.

lines.gurmukhi: sÍn ijhbw Aau locn imlY idAwl jYso sunY qYso dyiK kih smJwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Sravan Jihabaa Au Lochan Milai Diaala , Jaiso Sounai Taiso Daykhi Kahi Samajhaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If by the kindness of Almighty, the ears get tongue and eyes, then they will speak with tongue, what they see with eyes and hear.

lines.gurmukhi: ijhbw kau locn sÍn jau imlih dyv jYso khY qYso suin dyiK Aau idKwvhI
lines.transliteration_english: Jihabaa Kau Lochan Sravan Jau Milahi Dayva , Jaiso Kahai Taiso Souni Daykhi Au Dikhaavahee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: If the Almighty God bless the tongue with eyes .and ears it will say what it sees with eyes and hears with ears.

lines.gurmukhi: nYn jIh sÍn sÍn locn jIh ijhbw n sÍn locn llcwvhI ]397]
lines.transliteration_english: Nain Jeeh Sravan Sravan Lochan Jeeha , Jihabaa N Sravan Lochan Lalachaavahee ?397?

Shabad OS B.translation: Eyes need co-operation of tongue and ears, the ears need full co-operation of tongue and eyes but just as Guru Nanak on page 1091 of Guru Granth Sahib says '.'Jeebh rasayan chuni rati lal lavaaye" (Sucking the elixir-like Naam, meditating on Lord's name,
